color.options:
input-format - Color format to convert from
output-format - Color format to convert to
color - Color to convert
Supported formats: RGB, HEX, HSV, HSL, CMYK

profile.options:
user - User to display profile of
global - Check to display global profile

ranking.options:
global - Check to display global ranking instead of server
sort-by - Display ranking sorted by XP or Level

ban.options:
member - Member to ban
user-id - User ID to ban
time - Duration for temp ban
reason - Reason to ban
page - Display specific page of ban list

warn.options:
member - Member to warn
warn - Warn to remove
reason - Reason to warn

mute.options:
member - Member to mute
time - Duration for a mute
reason - Reason to mute

purge.options:
count - Number of messages to delete
user - Delete only this user's messages
channel - Delete messages from this channel

emoji.options:
url - URL of emoji
name - Name of emoji
emoji - Emoji to delete
reason - Reason to delete emoji
